translations: adj.仰卧的；懒散的；掌心向上的；向后靠的；消极的；苟安的

sentences.sentence: Although recent censure of corporate boards of directors as "passive" and "supine" may be excessive, those who criticize board performance have plenty of substantive ammunition.
sentences.translation: 尽管最近对公司董事会“被动”和“懒散”的指责可能有些过分，但那些批评董事会业绩的人有充足的实质性证据。

sentences.sentence: I lay supine on the poolside grass.
sentences.translation: 我仰面躺在游泳池边的草地上。
